metadata.title: CVE-2016-6773 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the ih264d decoder inMediaserver could enable a local malicious application to access dataoutside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate becauseit could be used to access sensitive data without permission. Product:Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0. Android ID: A-30481714.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
